      static void addTaskBD(int sliderValue, java.lang.String nameText, java.lang.String descriptionText, javafx.collections.ObservableList<Kid> selectedKids)
      adds a new task to the database using the input task name, description, points awarded on completion and to which kids it is.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Task> findCompletedTasks()
      searches the database for tasks that have been completed by this parents kids.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Task> getTasksBD(int parent)
      returns a list of all the tasks made by this parent.
      static void removeNotificationBD(Task task, Kid kid)
      whenever a task is completed and reviewed on the notification by the parent, we unlink the kid from this task
      static void setTaskCompleted(int kid, java.lang.String task)
      whenever a kid completes a task we update a variable so it shows up on the notification window for the parent to review.
      static void taskIsNotCompletedBD(int kid, int task)
      if the task is considered to not be complete we set it back default( not completed)

      • addTaskBD

        public static void addTaskBD(int sliderValue,
                             java.lang.String nameText,
                             java.lang.String descriptionText,
                             javafx.collections.ObservableList<Kid> selectedKids)
        adds a new task to the database using the input task name, description, points awarded on completion and to which kids it is. this connects the task to the parent who made it and connected to one or more kids that the parent chose to give the task to.
        Parameters:
        sliderValue -
        nameText -
        descriptionText -
        selectedKids -
